text: Punctoterebra trismacaria is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Punctoterebra trismacaria (Melvill, 1917). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=1416768 on 2020-01-30 ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== ==External links== * Fedosov, A. title: Punctoterebra trismacaria
